title: Straight from the heart
creator_credit: Woman Vision (USA), Straight from the Heart, Dee Mosbacher and Frances Reid
brief_description: This program examines the issues parents face in coming to terms with a gay or lesbian child. It presents interviews with parents and children and tackles issues in a positive and thought provoking manner including the diagnosis of a child with HIV or AIDS. Academy Award Nominee, Documentary Short Subject Category, 1995.
